fields.name: Impressionable (Passive):
fields.value: You must use the Factional Attack on whoever the Mafia Head directs you to. If there is more than one Mafia Head, you must use the Factional Attack based on a majority vote of Mafia Heads. If there is no Mafia Head, you must use the Factional Attack based on a majority vote of mafia players. If there is a tie, you may break the tie yourself, or it will be broken randomly.

fields.name: Loyal (Passive):
fields.value: If a Mafia Head player is attacked, you will be attacked instead.

fields.name: Bonus Attack (0x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlock and gain one ammo each time you place in the top 3. When using this ability, in addition to the Factional Attack dictated by Impressionable, you may use the Factional Attack on a second target of your choice. This ability ammo may not be adjusted by any other ability.
